item.description: Come join us after work and relax with old and new friends. Enjoy appetizers, fantastic company, and mix and mingle with other singles. There is no charge. For info, call Gail 860-582-8229. Directions to 32 Cooke St.: I 84 Exit 33 (Rt. 72W), then Exit 2 (Rt. 372), end of ramp turn left onto New Britain Ave., at next light turn right onto Cooke St., facility on right. Sponsored by Social Connections.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be inside waiting for you.

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
group.name: Singles Social Connections

item.name: Singles Happy Hour
